I do not like to be disrespectful but I found that the audio is not good. They might turned off the audio level. It makes the background sound so high when no one is speaking. This is what I found not mine but is the same complain:

"Sound track is total crap and makes this unwatchable. Please turn off the Auto sound levelling device because it is pumping up background sounds to DEAFENING levels during non-talking periods. The original soundtrack didn't need any fucking up."

1. The ending is not missing. 42 minutes is the standard procedure.

2. I don't know what audio compression you used, but this was absolutely horrible to hear. Every scene with background "nature" noises was dreadful: when they speak, the noise disappear, but comes back really loud when they stop talking. 

3. The video is sometimes a bit laggy. I've been downloading from VTV for years, never had those problems. What happened?

Thanks anyway for the overall amazing work!

V: 7/10. A: 3/10.
